title: 91/502/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 September 1991 determining the amount of VAT own resources payable by the Federal Republic of Germany for 1989 in respect of transactions covered by the 20th Council Directive 85/361/EEC of 16 July 1985 on the harmonization of the laws of the Member States relating to turnover taxes - Common system of value added tax: derogations in connection with the special aids granted to certain farmers to compensate for the dismantlement of monetary compensatory amounts applying to certain agricultural products (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 5 September 1991  determining the amount of VAT own resources payable by the Federal Republic of Germany for 1989 in respect of transactions covered by the 20th Council Directive 85/361/EEC of 16 July 1985 on the  harmonization of the laws of the Member States relating to turnover taxes - Common system of value added tax: derogations in connection with the special aids granted to certain farmers to compensate for the dismantlement of monetary compensatory amounts  applying to certain agricultural products  (Only the German text is authentic)  (91/502/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: VAT own resources payable by the Federal Republic of Germany for 1989 according to Article 5 of Directive 85/361/EEC amount to DM 160 170 000.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 September 1991. For the Commission
Peter SCHMIDHUBER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 192, 24. 7. 1985, p. 18. (2) OJ No L 155, 7. 6. 1989, p. 9.
